name: zone: a history
description:
zone is an online hangout space i built and run. this is a blurry history of how it came to be and who goes there

more information about zone: https://kool.tools/zone/about.html
a written history of zone: https://kool.tools/zone/timeline.html
explorable snapshot of zone3d: https://kool.tools/zone/snapshot/

made using the bitsymuse hack via https://kool.tools/bitsy/tools/bitsymuse-ui/

all music is midi stolen ruthlessly from the Old Web and converted to mp3 using some website
